ygData.subject: RE: Looking for spellcomponents
ygData.msgSnippet: I am on Mithanial Marr but am interested in the quest nonetheless. Could you give a bit of a description and remember to label it spoiler. Thanks Yinin of
ygData.messageBody:
I am on Mithanial Marr but am interested in the quest nonetheless. Could
you give a bit of a description and remember to label it spoiler.

Thanks
Yinin of Mithanial Marr


-----Original Message-----
From: Robert Ricardo [mailto:rricardo@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 5:28 AM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Looking for spellcomponents


From: "Robert Ricardo" <rricardo@...>

I have a Large Ruby on Cazic-Thule that is a component for a Wiz Quest.
A
guy in West Karana gives the quest. Tell Haliaz if interested.
